logistic.R: Outstanding Metaquest launch tasks (manuscript, outreach, endorsements)
logistic.Theta: Checkpoints in Manuskriptfinalisierung pdf + UTAC status matrix
logistic.zeta: Soothes when BreakPoint rituals and parity brief keep cadence

meta.resonance: Keeps Metaquest campaign artefacts aligned with the system spine so manuscripts, demos, and endorsements move in resonance rather than overshoot.

existing_assets.title: Manuskriptfinalisierung & Kampagnenstart
existing_assets.resonance: Defines readiness checklist for publication, endorsements, and campaign pacing.

notes.logistic_coupling: Θ checkpoints align Metaquest launch gating with manuscript + automation tasks.

existing_assets.title: UTAC Status Alignment v1.2
existing_assets.resonance: Tracks activation gaps, including Metaquest parity and telemetry requirements.

notes.logistic_coupling: Provides ΔAIC guards and activation sequencing so β remains disciplined during launch.

existing_assets.title: BreakPoint Analyse Rituals
existing_assets.resonance: WayToGo + ReaktionWayToGo capture pivot responses and resilience scripts.

notes.logistic_coupling: ζ(R) is damped when these rituals precede Metaquest outreach decisions.

needed_resonances.description: Draft Metaquest parity brief with narrative + risk posture and publish tri-layer.

threshold.Theta: brief cited in docs + codex prior to external announcements

needed_resonances.null_guard: Shadow alert sci-shadow-003 fires if absent at launch lock.

needed_resonances.description: Storyboard Metaquest simulator demos linked to manuscript figures and outreach schedule.

threshold.Theta: demo list mirrored between manuscript + simulator before press briefing

needed_resonances.null_guard: If storyboard missing, BreakPoint ritual mandates review before release.

needed_resonances.description: Endorsement + ethics alignment ledger specific to Metaquest activation.

threshold.Theta: ledger updated with Metaquest commitments and approvals

needed_resonances.null_guard: If ledger stale, escalate via sci-shadow-001 for governance hold.

activation_hooks.response: Update tri-layer, cross-link to codex + docs, notify simulator briefing list.
Verify BreakPoint references, attach ΔAIC context, cite parity brief.
Re-run BreakPoint ritual, refresh status matrix, document ΔΘ in codex.

null_model_reference.description: Null = Metaquest narrative runs without parity brief or BreakPoint guard; endorsements stall and outreach drifts.

monitoring.condition: Metaquest brief referenced in docs + codex
